2005.name: Junction of hallways
description: Training facilities are evident to the west. To the south lies a hallway
which has doors every couple of feet, looks like living quarters of some
sort.  To the east the tunnel leads back into the natural catacombs.

2056.name: Twisty passage
description: The passage bends north and east here.  To the east your not certain
what lies ahead due to all the twists and turns you've made.  To the
north is seems cold.

2021.name: Holy grove
description: The trees seem real enough even though they take root in solid rock.
You hear other small animals scampering through the light undergrowth
yet you see nothing. The grove continues south, east and west. An out of
place passage way for some reason heads north.

2035.name: Entrance to the burial grounds
description: You have entered what appears to be a burial ground of sorts. The
templars buried their dead here.  Chills go down your spine as you feel
something watching you.  You hear the random groan of a ghost, the howl
of a wraith, and the dry clanking of bones.

2029.name: Very dark caveway
description: This room is so very dark that no one is quite sure whats in it, so
there's nothing really to describe except maybe the powerful sense of
evil coming from the east and the almost overcoming urge to run to the
west.

2003.name: Weapon training area
description: This is a place to keep up on there weapon skills.  Much of the
equipment looks old and worn but upon further inspection seems quite
sturdy in fact.

2064.name: Tunnel
description: The tunnel slopes noticeably down to the north and you sense the surface
could be reached to the south.

2006.name: Hallway
description: The hallway takes on a more indoor look to the west.  To the east it
looks awfully dark.

2059.name: Lonely tunnel
description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. You see a
gate to a burial ground to the north.  This lonesome tunnel sighs along
west and east.

2031.name: Very dark cavern
description: The cavern is hard to describe due to the extreme magical darkness.
Probing with a light source seems to reveal nothing but more darkness.

2023.name: Mess hall
description: "mess" isn't exactly the best word to describe this room.  On the
contrary, it is immaculately clean.  A very long table stretches way off
to the north. A hallway is to the east.

2028.name: Holy grove
description: All of a sudden all the mysterious sounds of the grove stop. Or perhaps
its just the strange humming and glowing from a clearing to the south
drowning out everything else. There is a sort of magical forcefield door
to the south.
a glowing forcefield with a small circular hole in it.

2057.name: Cross of caverns
description: A little-used cavern enters from the south. A passage twists away to
the west.  An odd twinkling comes from the cave to the north.

2055.name: Scene of ghastly horror
description: An army of undead creatures of all types are lined up patiently. Their
leader is an evil demonoid necromancer.  His plans to use his army of
undead to take over the world seem about ready to get underway.

2042.name: Mist cavern
description: A warm wind blows in from the east.  The air is still stifling hot in
here despite the breeze.  The mist seems thick enough to be alive. . .

2009.name: Templar Knights sleeping quarters
description: This is a huge room which is filled wall to wall with beds. Apparently
all the low level knights all sleep in this one room.  A door on the
south wall is labelled "Elders only!".
This large pit has been crudely dug into to the cavernous mountain
floor from above.  Flickering sparkles coalesce off the rock creating
a prismatic look.

2024.name: End of a hallway
description: You hear voices coming from a room to the west.  the hallway goes north.
To the east lies a room which seems to glow with power and piety.

2052.name: Basement
description: Its dark and it smells like. ...BATS down here!  All you see is a swirl
of the darkness and lots of scratching bats madly flailing around. A set
of stairs go up into the building and a broken window leads west.

2037.name: Burial grounds
description: It seems as if many of the warriors could not stop fighting even in
death.  They fight amongst each other and flail at any living being
that would wander near.

2040.name: Misty cavern
description: A chilling icy mist swirl about you.  The dampness and warmth has become
bitter cold.  The walls of the cavern are several feet thick with ice
here.  An icy wind blows from the south.

2013.name: Administration room
description: The elders gather here to discuss training strategies and count their
loot.  You notice papers which look like important secret documents
lying around. An escape passage leads west.
It seems that the loot comes from raids on the towns in the surrounding
areas above ground.  From the documents it seems that the pages and
trainees are kidnapped from the villages too!

2065.name: Southern entrance to the catacombs
description: Through a trapdoor above you streams light.  Through a doorway to
the north streams darkness.  A message has been scrawled upon the wall
here.  The message reads:
Adventure for the strong yet calculating
Death for the weak and shallow
Treasure for the smart and lucky
Death for the stupid and accursed
An ancient Glyph above the entrance keeps monsters from wandering up
from the catacombs.

2018.name: High officer's room
description: First thing you notice in this room is the pleasant aroma of cedar.  All
the paneling in the room is made of fine cedar.  A painting of an
elegant knight hangs on the wall.
Something oddly familiar about the knight.  He carries a glowing sword
with a silvery blade.

2044.name: Huge multicolored tunnel
description: The tunnel leads north and south.  To the south there is an odd
twinkling phenomenon.

2034.name: Intersection of caverns
description: Caverns head north, south and east from this peculiar spot. Medium
sized caverns from the east and the north join to form a huge cavern
heading south.  The walls of the cavern are made of a bizarre mixture
of many shiny crystals.

2033.name: Misty passageway
description: Warm mist swirl about you making you feel threatened as well as
protected at the same time.  The swirling mist makes it tough to tell
directions quite clearly, but you seem to be able to go north or south.
The mist gets denser to the south.

2041.name: Misty cavern
description: The temperature is a pleasant and mild here.  This is due to a warm wind
blowing in from the east and a chilly breeze blowing in from the west.
The updrafts create bizarre icy-steamy mists which dance along the
walls.

2002.name: North/south tunnel
description: This part of the catacombs looked roughly hewn and man-made. There is
a large cross painted on the floor of the tunnel.To the south it seems
maybe a bit lighter for some odd reason.  To the north a ray of light
comes in from a hole in the ceiling.
The cross is a Templar's cross. It seems to have had a fresh coat of
paint recently.

2058.name: Lonely tunnel
description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. Its just
a feeling you get from this tunnel.  The tunnel east and west.

2025.name: Grand Templar's room
description: All the items in this room look ancient yet strangely very powerful and
rich.  There is an aura of great holiness about the room.

2048.name: Twisty cavern
description: The way twist this way and that and its all you can do to keep your head
from spinning.  The air is very cold here and layers of ice on the wall.
The sounds of metal on ice echo through the cavern. A side passage leads
east and the main passage goes north and south.

2038.name: Burial grounds
description: Legions of skeletal warriors wander by and battle the enemy even in
death.  Old battlelines have been forgotten and new ones made. Its a
gruesome scene.

2046.name: Curators place
description: The undertaker, the historian and the curator used to be here. Now they
too have joined the legions of the undead.  From the looks of the place
they seem to have starved to death.  Rickety stairs head down into a
sort of basement.
Surprisingly the stairs look sturdy enough.

2027.name: Holy grove
description: The grove continues north and east.  To the east a strange humming can
barely be heard.

2017.name: N/S hallway
description: The hallway continues north and south.  A peculiar kind of glow seems
to come from somewhere further along the hallway to the south. The room
to the east looks like the lap of luxury.

2008.name: Pages' sleeping quarters
description: Several bunk beds are lined up across the room.  It looks rather spartan
and there is little evidence of toys or games.  Most of the desks are
filled with books and papers of little interest.

2012.name: Humid, damp tunnel
description: As the tunnel leads south it gets more humid and damp.  Moss covers the
walls and ferns even grow in the cracks here and there.  To the north it
seems much more sterile.

2060.name: Bend in the lonely tunnel
description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. The
tunnel bends west and south.

2043.name: Waterfall of mist
description: River of hot mist pour down in a cascade from a hole in the cavern.  It
falls like water down from the heights like a waterfall and creates
beautiful swirls.  It causes a hot wind to flow west.
The hole is much too high up for you to reach.

2004.name: Prayer training area
description: The templar's curious mix of religion and fighting is evident here.
A central painting depicts a cross composed of swords.  The elders
teach the ancient art of prayer to the young pages.

2010.name: N/S hallway
description: The hallway leads north an south.  A door leads to a templar's room to
the east.  The decoration looks rather sparse here.

2022.name: Holy grove
description: The grove continues west and south.  The glow is roughly to the south
somewhere.

2032.name: Holy place
description: A glowing stone lies in the center of the clearing.  You recognize it as
the stone of the Excalibur.  The strange humming glowing makes it
difficult to see if the Excalibur is there or not. Might want to take a
closer look if possible.
a glowing forcefield with a small circular hole in it.

2020.name: Holy grove
description: A small grove of birches grow seem to grow from solid rock.  You hear
birds singing but try as you might you cant see any.  A strange glow
emanates from a place somewhere to the southeast in the grove.

2054.name: Southern gate
description: A rusty gate here no longer keeps anyone out or in.  You see a lonely
E/W passage to the south.  A little used trail winds east through a
crack in the wall.

2007.name: Intersection
description: The tunnel continues to the north and the south, becoming less hewn and
more natural to the south.  A passageway lined with paneling leads west.

2049.name: Striped tunnel
description: The walls of the tunnels have many brilliant colors in them from the
various veins of crystals running in them.  An odd twinkling comes from
the east.

2063.name: Tunnel
description: The tunnel heads north and south.  North you see an intersection and
far to the south you sense light and smell a fresh breeze.

2066.name: Unknown passage
description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way.  You look back from whence you
came but there's no exit there anymore.  There are exits in other
directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

2039.name: New graves
description: The tombs in this section seem somewhat more recent.  Rotting zombie
warriors groan and wail with blank stares.  You hear sounds of digging
off a bit to the south.

2053.name: Fresh graves
description: The graves here seem very recent.  You notice many signs of digging and
defilement.  There are piles of fresh bodies here awaiting burial.  A
strange sense of evil magic from the south makes the hairs on the back
of your neck to stand on end!

2061.name: Lonely tunnel
description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. The very
walls of the tunnel seems to groan.  to the north the tunnel bends and
east is an intersection.

2050.name: Prism cave
description: The roof of this cave peaks over a hundred feet high making it one of
the biggest in the catacombs.  Crystals of every color cast prismatic
sprays of light everywhere.  The light from your lamp causes almost a
blinding flare of brilliance as more light is added to the multi-colored
twinkling phenomenon that exists here.  This is also the lair of the
fabled and feared Prism Dragon.

2069.name: Unknown passage
description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way.  You look back from whence you
came but there's no exit there anymore.  There are exits in other
directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

2068.name: Unknown passage
description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way.  You look back from whence you
came but there's no exit there anymore.  There are exits in other
directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

2036.name: Burial grounds
description: Random tombs to unknown warriors were lain in rows as far as the eye
can see.  To your horror many of the graves are empty and desecrated.
A gap in the rows of tombs leads south and there are more graves to the
east and west.

2019.name: Mossy intersection
description: There is a turn off to the passage here.  The main passage leads north
and south. To the south it seems to get impossibly darker.  To the east
you hear... birds?  A small rivulet of water seeps in from the passage
east.  The air is very humid and damp here.

2011.name: Middle-aged templar's room
description: This is a room furnished in a room becoming a low level templar scribe.
No real amenities but better than a communal sleeping quarters. As far
as you can tell he would be a rank equivalent to a Sargeant.

2067.name: Unknown passage
description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way.  You look back from whence you
came but there's no exit there anymore.  There are exits in other
directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

2030.name: Deep within the catacombs
description: It stinks like a lair in here.  A rotten smell of humanoid flesh
lingers.  You stumble over what you think are corpses in the utter
darkness. You sense a evil growl from somewhere in the room. maybe
everywhere in the room. . ..

2016.name: Mess hall
description: The a huge table with an immaculate white table cloth stretches way off
to the south.  The room is kept immaculately clean by the nights
themselves.  They truly belive that cleanliness is next to godliness.

2026.name: Very dark passage
description: This room is so dark that even powerful magic lights seems to barely
illuminate the ground in front of you.  If its possible it seems even
darker to the south.  The passage also leads back north.

2001.name: North entrance to the catacombs
description: You are almost surprised to see a tunnel leading off to the south
into utter darkness.  The floorboards above you haven't been moved
in a long time, yet there is life down here.  A beam of light from
the opening above you falls upon a message scrawled on the wall here.
The message reads:
Adventure for the strong yet calculating
Death for the weak and shallow
Treasure for the smart and lucky
Death for the stupid and accursed
An ancient Glyph above the entrance keeps monsters from wandering up
from the catacombs.

2062.name: Intersection
description: To the north you enter the burial grounds.  a trail of blood leads that
direction.  Also you feel an ominous sense of evil magic from there.
The tunnel to the west creaks and sighs as if alive.  To the south you
smell a hint of fresh air.

2014.name: N/S hallway
description: The hallway continues to become more important-looking as you wander
south.  A room to the east looks rather more pleasant that some of the
others.

2045.name: Desolate ruins
description: Several mausoleums used to grace the way here but these have been
defiled. And most have been torn down and burned by looters. Some still
seem to be intact to the south.  To the northwest is a seeming field of
tombs of soldiers, now a battleground for the undead.

2015.name: Mid-level leader's room
description: A rather nice looking room considering the drab conditions down here.
Through all the signs of decoration you can still see evidence of water
leaks.

2051.name: Ruined monument
description: A monument to a famous king once stood here. Not much is left to even
signify that is was here at all.  A building of some sort can be entered
through a basement to the east.  The southern gate of the grounds is to
the south.

2016.name: the prism dragon~
description: The spray of colored light bouncing off his scales is almost blinding.
subroutines:
M speech 2012 tch~
M speech 2011 prism light~
M speech 2002 link our minds~
M grall 2001 100~
M speech 2000 lockup~
M speech 2016 blackrose~
M random 2004 2~
M random 2005 2~
M random 2007 2~
M random 2006 2~
M random 2008 2~
M random 2009 2~
M random 2010 2~
2016.room_name: The light shines off a beautiful but dangerous dragon lurking here.

2017.name: The DarkenBeast~
description: You see nothing more than the sense of darkness and evil.
2017.room_name: You hear and smell the presence of the darkenbeast.

2060.name: Some {-p{-r{-i{-s{-m{-a{-t{-i{-c {xmist~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

2001.name: a bat~
description: Your typical smelly, blind flying mammal.
2001.room_name: A bat flaps wildly at you!

2002.name: a templar page~
description: He has lost his family and everything of his former life.
2002.room_name: A templar page in training is here looking mildly confused.

2003.name: a spelunker~
description:
He recently discovered these catacombs and wants to see where they lead.
He just hopes he doesn't get killed in the process.  He carries only
essential exploration gear; if there IS anything down here, he
probably won't last long.
2003.room_name: A spelunker knows his way around these tunnels.

2004.name: a graverobber~
description:
Working for an evil necromancer isn't the greatest thing in the world.
They seem like little more than zombie servants themselves.

2005.name: some mist~
description: In fact it IS alive in a magical sort of sense.
2005.room_name: Some mist swirls about you here ... it seems ALIVE!

2007.name: a skeleton~
description:
Even though he has died in the physical sense of the word, the battle
continues for him in his charmed state.
2007.room_name: A skeletal soldier fights in the battle of the underworld.

2008.name: a templar~
description:
As you peer closely he peers back at you

A templar peers closely at you.
A templar tells you, "You are an evil force trying to spread your ways!".
A templar tells you, "You must die for your sin!".
2008.room_name: A templar shouts "AKK! SLAY THE INFIDEL!"

2009.name: a mysterious wraith~
description: Hard to tell much about the mysterious form even upon further inspection.
2009.room_name: A mysterious ghostly wraith forms before your eyes.

2010.name: the templar officer~
description: A templar officer tells you "Better move along evil one!"
2010.room_name: A templar officer keeps an eye on things here.

2011.name: zombie~
description: He seems to lack real interest in what he is doing.
2011.room_name: A blank-faced zombie mage joins the battle.

2012.name: the shadow~
description: Looks vaguely you-shaped.

2013.name: The vampire~
description: A rather LARGE "bat" ...
2013.room_name: A bat flaps wildly at you!

2014.name: the evil necromancer~
description:
Though he seems absorbed in his work, you'd bet he'd take the time out
to kill you to get a fresh corpse!
2014.room_name: The evil necromancer makes undead soldiers from corpses.

2015.name: the grand templar~
description:
A slight, tolerant smile comes briefly across his face.  In the blink
of an eye he seems stern again.
2015.room_name: The grand templar stands here quietly observing your actions
